title: Large-Scale Attention-Focused Strategies for Improving Golf Putting Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic golf rules and basic proficiency in using smart devices
context.additional_context: Stress management and team-building program linked for managers/leaders.

learning_goals: Learners can improve putting accuracy by over 20% using external focus instructions (observing the ball's roll speed).
Learners can cognitively analyze coordination between body parts during putting movements through daily 15-minute mobile learning.
Learners can complete team-based collaborative tasks (putting skill demonstration and feedback video production) by the second week.

resources: Smartphone/tablet, putting simulator app, motion analysis software, mini putting mat

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
